text:
@GregAbbott_TX IV use in hospital at $1,000-$4K a dose for 5 to 10 doses. Who can afford it? Why force a patient to be in hospital, when you could release #Hydroxychloroquine for Drs to use? Reduce costs, hospitalizations & deaths. 
#txlege #Texas #covid19
